headline: OHA is Administrative Agent & Joint Lead Arranger of Private Unitranche Financing Supporting Berkshire Partners’ Acquisition of Triumvirate Environmental
summary: New York, New York, Feb. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Oak Hill Advisors (“OHA”) served as Administrative Agent and Joint Lead Arranger for the private unitranche facility used to support the acquisition of Triumvirate Environmental, Inc. (“Triumvirate”) by Berkshire Partners. Triumvirate is a specialized commercial waste management and environmental services provider to companies in the life sciences, healthcare, education and industrial markets. The financing consists of a unitranche term loan,
